article.headline: Portland St. 80, N. Arizona 66
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. (AP) -- Kyle Coston scored a career-high 22 points to lead Portland State to an 80-66 victory over Northern Arizona on Saturday night. Andre Murray added 17 points for the Vikings (9-7, 2-1 Big Sky Conference) and Jeremiah Dominguez chipped in 11 points and seven assists. Zarko Comagic led Northern Arizona (10-6, 2-1) with 19 points and Kyle Landry had 12 points for the Lumberjacks. Portland State's offense came out swinging, hitting seven of its first 10 shots to open a 17-4 lead in the first six minutes. The Vikings, who shot 53 percent from the field, kept the pressure on all night and led by as many as 27 points in the second half on their way to their second consecutive conference win. The Vikings shot 55 percent (11-20) from 3-point range and outrebounded the Lumberjacks 33-23. Northern Arizona shot 30 percent in the first half and trailed 35-21 at the break. The Lumberjacks hit 52 percent in the second half, but most of those shots fell once the outcome was no longer in doubt.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
